dxf2svg.util
Class DxfElementPair

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.util.DxfElementPair
public final class DxfElementPair
extends java.lang.Object

DxfElementPair is a wrapper class for the primitive data types extracted from a Dxf file. A DXF file is a list of "group codes", each followed by a new line and its corresponding value. This class encapsulates this pair of datum into one object.

Version:
1.12 April 14, 2005
Author:
Andrew Nisbet
